name: Goldeen
flavorText:
Its tail fin
billows like an
elegant ballroom dress, giving it
the nickname of
the Water Queen.

previous.name: Seadra
previous.flavorText:
Capable of swim­
ming backwards by
rapidly flapping its wing-like
pectoral fins and
stout tail.

next.name: Seaking
next.flavorText:
In the autumn spawning season, they can
be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and
creeks.
